mapper.select: select ft.feed_id, ft.user_id, ft.feed_content, fiut.feed_img_url, ut.profile_img_url, ut.nickname, (select count(*) from feed_like_tb where feed_id = ft.feed_id) as like_count from save_board_tb sbt left outer join feed_tb ft on (sbt.board_id = ft.feed_id) left outer join user_tb ut on (ft.user_id = ut.user_id) left outer join feed_img_url_tb fiut on (ft.feed_id = fiut.feed_id) where sbt.save_board_userId = #{userId} and sbt.menu_category_id = 1 order by sbt.create_date desc

select lt.lunch_id, lt.lunch_title, lt.lunch_content, lt.lunch_place_name, lt.lunch_place_x, lt.lunch_place_y, lt.lunch_place_url, lt.create_date, lt.update_date, ut.nickname, ut.profile_img_url, liut.lunch_img_url, lctt.lunch_category_name from save_board_tb sbt left outer join lunch_tb lt on (sbt.board_id = lt.lunch_id) left outer join user_tb ut on (lt.user_id = ut.user_id) left outer join lunch_img_url_tb liut on (liut.lunch_id = lt.lunch_id) left outer join lunch_category_tb lctt on (lctt.lunch_id = lt.lunch_id) where sbt.save_board_userId = #{userId} and sbt.menu_category_id = 2 order by sbt.create_date desc;
